casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Lawrence HAWES. No. 582P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 3, 2005. Janet J. Lennon, for Lawrence Hawes. Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 14th day of October 2005 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to file a Petition for Discretionary Review of an order of Court of Appeals or, Alternatively, to Permit a Motion for Appropriate Relief, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of November 2005."
